value.string:
selection
 selection_domain
 selection_report
 selection_params=""
 selection_sort_on
 select_expression
 from_date=""
 at_date=""
 to_date=""
 node=""
 resource=""
 entity=""
 stat=""
 omit_input=""
 omit_output=""
 amount=""
 amount_range_min=""
 amount_range_max=""
 creation_date_range_min=""
 creation_date_range_max=""
 section_category=""
 count=""
 transaction=""
 specific_reference

<dtml-let params="selection and selection.getParams() or selection_params">
 <dtml-let allowed_roles_and_users="portal_catalog.getAllowedRolesAndUsers(**params)">
 <dtml-comment>do something to have a query without RolesAndUsers security for global stats</dtml-comment>
 <dtml-let query="(stat) and portal_catalog.buildSQLQuery(**params) or portal_catalog.buildSQLQuery(allowedRolesAndUsers=allowed_roles_and_users, **params)">
 
 <dtml-let use_movement_table="from_date or to_date or at_date or resource or stat or amount or amount_range_min or amount_range_max or section_category or entity">
 
 SELECT
 <dtml-if stat>
 SUM(stock.total_price) AS total_price
 <dtml-elif count>
 COUNT(DISTINCT catalog.uid) AS count
 <dtml-else>
 DISTINCT
 <dtml-if section_category>
 IF(category.uid = delivery.source_section_uid,
 catalog.source_reference,
 catalog.destination_reference) AS specific_reference,
 <dtml-else>
 '???' AS specific_reference,
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-in "portal_catalog.getCatalogSearchResultKeys()"> <dtml-var sequence-item> <dtml-unless sequence-end>,</dtml-unless> </dtml-in>
 <dtml-if select_expression>, <dtml-var select_expression> </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 FROM
 <dtml-in prefix="table" expr="query['from_table_list']">
 <dtml-if "table_key not in ('delivery', 'catalog')">
 <dtml-var table_item> AS <dtml-var table_key>,
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 <dtml-if selection_domain><dtml-var "selection_domain.asSqlJoinExpression()">,</dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report><dtml-var "selection_report.asSqlJoinExpression()">, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table> movement, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "stat or omit_input or omit_output or node">
 stock, catalog as child, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "section_category">category, </dtml-if>
 delivery,
 catalog
 
 WHERE
 delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if "query['where_expression']">
 AND <dtml-var "query['where_expression']">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "selection_domain.asSqlExpression()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "selection_report.asSqlExpression(strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if specific_reference> AND (
 catalog.source_reference LIKE <dtml-sqlvar specific_reference type="string">
 OR catalog.destination_reference LIKE <dtml-sqlvar specific_reference type="string"> )</dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction> AND catalog.uid = <dtml-var transaction> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount> AND ABS(movement.quantity) = <dtml-sqlvar amount type="float"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_min> AND ABS(movement.quantity) >= <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_min type="float"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_max> AND ABS(movement.quantity) < <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_max type="float"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_min> AND catalog.creation_date >= <dtml-sqlvar creation_date_range_min type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_max> AND catalog.creation_date < <dtml-sqlvar "creation_date_range_max+1" type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table> AND movement.explanation_uid = catalog.uid </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource> AND movement.resource_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(resource).getUid()"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if entity> AND ( delivery.destination_section_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(entity).getUid()">
 OR delivery.source_section_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(entity).getUid()">
 ) </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if section_category> AND (
 category.uid = delivery.destination_section_uid
 OR category.uid = delivery.source_section_uid)
 AND category.category_uid = <dtml-var "portal_categories.restrictedTraverse(section_category).getUid()">
 </dtml-if>
 
 -- FIXME: we want stop date when we are destination_section and start_date when
 -- we are source_section (one solution is to read in stock.date, but we try
 -- to avoid the use of stock table here)
 <dtml-if from_date> AND movement.start_date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date> AND movement.start_date <= <dtml-sqlvar expr="to_date+1" type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date> AND movement.start_date < <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if node>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid = <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if stat> AND movement.is_accountable = 1
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input> AND stock.total_price < 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output> AND stock.total_price > 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if expr="selection is not None and selection.isInvertMode() and len(selection.getInvertModeUidList()) > 0">
 AND ( 0 = 1
 <dtml-in expr="selection.getInvertModeUidList()">
 OR catalog.uid = <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 --
 -- FIXME: This method sometime return non-unique row, problably because of bad acquisition.
 --
 -- Exemple of bad result:
 -- +--------------------+--------------------------------+------------+
 -- | specific_reference | path | uid |
 -- +--------------------+--------------------------------+------------+
 -- | 5525 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5238 | 1990514240 |
 -- | 59 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5238 | 1990514240 |
 -- | 60 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5156 | 1990502389 |
 -- | 5526 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5156 | 1990502389 |
 -- | 61 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5226 | 1990513370 |
 --
 -- Instead of the previous, we expect to get the following result:
 -- +--------------------+--------------------------------+------------+
 -- | specific_reference | path | uid |
 -- +--------------------+--------------------------------+------------+
 -- | 5525 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5238 | 1990514240 |
 -- | 5526 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5156 | 1990502389 |
 --
 <dtml-if "query['order_by_expression']">
 ORDER BY <dtml-var "query['order_by_expression']">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-unless count>
 <dtml-if "query['limit_expression']">
 LIMIT <dtml-var "query['limit_expression']">
 <dtml-else>
 LIMIT 1000
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-unless>
 
 </dtml-let>
 </dtml-let>
 </dtml-let>
 </dtml-let>

<dtml-let params="selection and selection.getParams() or selection_params">
 <dtml-let allowed_roles_and_users="portal_catalog.getAllowedRolesAndUsers(**params)">
 <dtml-comment>do something to have a query without RolesAndUsers security for global stats</dtml-comment>
 <dtml-let query="(stat) and portal_catalog.buildSQLQuery(**params) or portal_catalog.buildSQLQuery(allowedRolesAndUsers=allowed_roles_and_users, **params)">
 
 <dtml-let use_movement_table="from_date or to_date or at_date or resource or stat or amount or amount_range_min or amount_range_max or section_category or entity">
 
 SELECT
 <dtml-if stat>
 SUM(stock.total_price) AS total_price
 <dtml-elif count>
 COUNT(DISTINCT catalog.uid) AS count
 <dtml-else>
 DISTINCT
 <dtml-if section_category>
 IF(category.uid = delivery.source_section_uid,
 catalog.source_reference,
 catalog.destination_reference) AS specific_reference,
 <dtml-else>
 '???' AS specific_reference,
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-in "portal_catalog.getCatalogSearchResultKeys()"> <dtml-var sequence-item> <dtml-unless sequence-end>,</dtml-unless> </dtml-in>
 <dtml-if select_expression>, <dtml-var select_expression> </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 FROM
 <dtml-in prefix="table" expr="query['from_table_list']">
 <dtml-if "table_key not in ('delivery', 'catalog')">
 <dtml-var table_item> AS <dtml-var table_key>,
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 <dtml-if selection_domain><dtml-var "selection_domain.asSqlJoinExpression()">,</dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report><dtml-var "selection_report.asSqlJoinExpression()">, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table> movement, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "stat or omit_input or omit_output or node">
 stock, catalog as child, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "section_category">category, </dtml-if>
 delivery,
 catalog
 
 WHERE
 delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if "query['where_expression']">
 AND <dtml-var "query['where_expression']">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "selection_domain.asSqlExpression()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "selection_report.asSqlExpression(strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if specific_reference> AND (
 catalog.source_reference LIKE <dtml-sqlvar specific_reference type="string">
 OR catalog.destination_reference LIKE <dtml-sqlvar specific_reference type="string"> )</dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction> AND catalog.uid = <dtml-var transaction> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount> AND ABS(movement.quantity) = <dtml-sqlvar amount type="float"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_min> AND ABS(movement.quantity) >= <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_min type="float"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_max> AND ABS(movement.quantity) < <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_max type="float"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_min> AND catalog.creation_date >= <dtml-sqlvar creation_date_range_min type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_max> AND catalog.creation_date < <dtml-sqlvar "creation_date_range_max+1" type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table> AND movement.explanation_uid = catalog.uid </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource> AND movement.resource_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(resource).getUid()"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if entity> AND ( delivery.destination_section_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(entity).getUid()">
 OR delivery.source_section_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(entity).getUid()">
 ) </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if section_category> AND (
 category.uid = delivery.destination_section_uid
 OR category.uid = delivery.source_section_uid)
 AND category.category_uid = <dtml-var "portal_categories.restrictedTraverse(section_category).getUid()">
 </dtml-if>
 
 -- FIXME: we want stop date when we are destination_section and start_date when
 -- we are source_section (one solution is to read in stock.date, but we try
 -- to avoid the use of stock table here)
 <dtml-if from_date> AND movement.start_date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date> AND movement.start_date <= <dtml-sqlvar expr="to_date+1" type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date> AND movement.start_date < <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if node>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid = <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if stat> AND movement.is_accountable = 1
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input> AND stock.total_price < 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output> AND stock.total_price > 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if expr="selection is not None and selection.isInvertMode() and len(selection.getInvertModeUidList()) > 0">
 AND ( 0 = 1
 <dtml-in expr="selection.getInvertModeUidList()">
 OR catalog.uid = <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 --
 -- FIXME: This method sometime return non-unique row, problably because of bad acquisition.
 --
 -- Exemple of bad result:
 -- +--------------------+--------------------------------+------------+
 -- | specific_reference | path | uid |
 -- +--------------------+--------------------------------+------------+
 -- | 5525 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5238 | 1990514240 |
 -- | 59 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5238 | 1990514240 |
 -- | 60 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5156 | 1990502389 |
 -- | 5526 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5156 | 1990502389 |
 -- | 61 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5226 | 1990513370 |
 --
 -- Instead of the previous, we expect to get the following result:
 -- +--------------------+--------------------------------+------------+
 -- | specific_reference | path | uid |
 -- +--------------------+--------------------------------+------------+
 -- | 5525 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5238 | 1990514240 |
 -- | 5526 | /nexedi/accounting_module/5156 | 1990502389 |
 --
 <dtml-if "query['order_by_expression']">
 ORDER BY <dtml-var "query['order_by_expression']">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-unless count>
 <dtml-if "query['limit_expression']">
 LIMIT <dtml-var "query['limit_expression']">
 <dtml-else>
 LIMIT 1000
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-unless>
 
 </dtml-let>
 </dtml-let>
 </dtml-let>
 </dtml-let>
